item.description:
The Capitol Cinema Collective invites you to a benefit for the 3rd Annual Hartford International Film Festival (HIFF 3). HIFF 3 celebrates cinema in Hartford. HIFF 3 is Nov. 6-9, 2008. THe benefit will help the organizers do the usual things, pay for our theaters, buy food for the parties, pay for posters, tickets, etc.

You can help by attending the benefit. The suggested donation is $25.00, but we won't turn anyone away. If you donate $100.00 you name will appear in our Program and on the big screen. You can visit our web site: http://hiffct.org... for more info.

PS You won't miss Alina's going away party as it is at 9:00 and we are 7:00- 9:00 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at ther door, I'm the treasurer.
item.name: Benefit for Hartford International Film Festival
